body_html:
I'm sorry I wasn't clear! (Not a stupid question :) I meant to try the most recently checked-in code which I think has fixed this problem, rather than the version 1.2.0 that you report above.

If you don't want to wait for the next release that would mean installing from sources or trying the nightly binaries.

body:
I'm sorry I wasn't clear! (Not a stupid question :) I meant to try the most recently checked-in code which I think has fixed this problem, rather than the version 1.2.0 that you report above.

If you don't want to wait for the next release that would mean [installing from sources](https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_sources) or trying the [nightly binaries](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow).
